Classes in network used by network
Interface
          A network interface.
Interface.DisconnectedException
          Exception indicating that an Interface.send(Message) call was made to an interface that has been disconnected.
Kernel
          Logic responsible for handling routing and messaging for a single node.
KnownPort
           
Message
           
Node
          A machine on the network.
OperatingSystem
          The API by which a Process can perform system operations such as OperatingSystem.send(Message) and OperatingSystem.receive(int).
OperatingSystem.DisconnectedException
          Exception indicating that an OperatingSystem.send(Message) call was made when the node is not connected to any other.
Process
          The software loaded into a node.
Simulator
          The main control interface to the simulation.
Simulator.NodeBuilder
          A constructor object for Node objects.
SimulatorFactory
          Entry point to the network simulator.
UserKernel
          A kernel which can load and run a Process with user code.
